title: Roast sweet potato chilli chips
description: Make your chips a little bit healthier with sweet potatoes - and spice them up as much as you like.

default: 350g/12oz sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into chips
1 tsp crushed dried chilli flakes or smoked paprika

steps: Place the sweet potato chips into a roasting tin and drizzle over the olive oil and season with the salt, crushed dried chilli flakes and freshly ground black pepper. Toss well to coat, then roast in the oven for 20-30 minutes, or until the sweet potato chips are crisp and golden-brown.
Pile onto a plate and serve immediately.
